name: XG Soar Responder
author: Ben Verschaeren
description: Used for connecting into the XG SOAR Connector

configurationItems.name: xg_soar_connector_url
configurationItems.description: The base URL to the Sophos XG Connector

configurationItems.name: xg_soar_connector_token
configurationItems.description: The API token generated from the SOPHOS XG Connector
